name: Duke: The Apocalypse 2
summary: Duke: The Apocalypse 2 is a rare shovelware collection of two Duke Nukem 3D expansion packs, Duke!ZONE and Duke It Out In D.C., along with the GameWizards' Interactive Unlock the Secrets Game Guide for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. This package also included the same Duke Xtreme t-shirt from the original Duke: The Apocalypse. Little is known about this release, and it is incredibly elusive.
